name: Ashburn Chemical Cleaner Degreaser XHD
description: Ashburn Chemical Cleaner Degreaser XHD is a powerful, all purpose butyl based cleaner and degreaser. A balanced blend of solvents, surface active agents, sequestering agents and penetrants. Can be diluted with water to form cleaning solutions for hundreds of needs. Removes dirt, grease, oils, and other soils quickly and easily. Works with warm or cold water. Superb for floors, walls, and various industrial machinery.
